Name: Frequency of 'SW-Checklist Completed' before 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment' occurs

Name: Percentage of manuscripts with 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all manuscripts processed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' that are followed by 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' in manuscripts that require major revision compared to those that are accepted ('SW-EIC Major Revision' vs 'SW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Checklist Completed' in the variant leading to 'SW-EIC Reject'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Reject' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' followed by 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' that lead to a 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' status, indicating successful reviewer assignment
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Checklist Completed' in manuscripts that exceed the Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' in manuscripts that eventually get 'SW-EIC Accept' status, indicating successful publication
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' followed by 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1', indicating delays in reviewer response
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' for manuscripts that require 'SW-EIC Major Revision' versus 'SW-EIC Minor Revision'
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Checklist Completed' in the most common process variant
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' for cases where activity '' does not occur

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' in manuscripts that are withdrawn ('Manuscript is Withdrawn') after checklist completion
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'Manuscript is Withdrawn'

Name: Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' that precede 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision', indicating readiness for editorial decision
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' in manuscripts that go through the 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' stage
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' in manuscripts that do not proceed to 'Manuscript Export Succeeded', indicating potential issues in the submission process
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Checklist Completed' out of all cases where 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'SW-Checklist Completed' followed by any activity related to revision ('SW–Major Revision due in 1 week', 'SW–Minor Revision due in 1 month', etc.)
Number of 'SW-Checklist Completed' per month to track seasonal variations in submission volume
